DOC.brief_summary: Combined clinical data FK506 database GO Kyoto Encyclopedia Genes Genomes（KEGG） , investigator aim carry bioinformatic analysis build muti-locus genetic model , muti-center ass predictive accuracy FK506 metabolic difference .
